patthana15.69:4.1: Sauttaraṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanuttaro nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.69:4.2: Anuttaraṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanuttaro nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.69:5.1: Sauttaraṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanuttaro naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
